programme.title: JAG: Psychic Warrior
programme.desc: When a Navy research project involving ESP and psychic phenomenon goes awry, resulting in the death of one of the research subjects, the Admiral in charge is court-martialed.

programme.title: JAG: Rouge
programme.desc: As the lowest ranking lawyer at JAG, Bud is assigned to accompany Raglan, a former Special Forces operative who is hired by the Pentagon to test security at military bases.

programme.title: JAG: Mishap
programme.desc: Skates", Harm's RIO when he was aboard the USS Patrick Henry, was the Landing Safety Officer in charge of the deck when a Tomcat crashes while making an emergency landing.

programme.title: JAG: Mishap
programme.desc: Skates", Harm's RIO when he was aboard the USS Patrick Henry, was the Landing Safety Officer in charge of the deck when a Tomcat crashes while making an emergency landing.

programme.title: JAG: Into the Breach
programme.desc: Harm and Mac agree to help guide young student "attorneys" at Iron Forge Naval Academy, a prep school for the US Naval Academy, as they conduct a mock trial.

programme.title: JAG: Boomerang (Part 2)
programme.desc: Hostilities between Harm and Brumby escalate both in and out of the courtroom and it takes Chegwidden, with Brumby's CO's approval to get them to deal with their anger.

programme.title: JAG: People V. Gunny
programme.desc: Gunny is charged with gay-bashing following an off duty altercation outside a gay bar.

programme.title: JAG: The Bridge At Kang So Ri
programme.sub-title: The Bridge At Kang So Ri
programme.desc: Harm and Mac board a plane bound for Korea to investigate charges that GI's shot and killed civilians during the Korean War.

programme.title: JAG: Drop Zone
programme.desc: Mac is prosecuting a SEAL jumpmaster charged with causing the death of one of his men during a parachute insertion exercise.

programme.title: JAG: Real Deal Seal
programme.desc: Medal of Honor Navy SEAL Lt. Curtis Rivers is court-martialed for punching a Congressional candidate who claims to be a Navy SEAL.

programme.title: JAG: Killer Instinct
programme.desc: Louis Cellucci is having a rough time aboard the flight deck of the USS Benjamin Harrison. Moments after he walks away from another failed attempt at fixing an F-14, shouts of Man Overboard! are heard across the deck.(n)

programme.title: JAG: To Walk on Wings
programme.desc: Congresswoman Latham and a colleague watch four marine jumpers jump into the ocean from an M22 Osprey. With two marines left to jump, the plane is struck by a swell in the ocean. Harm and Mac are instructed to investigate.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Guilt
programme.desc: When Captain Huddleston hears that the marine corporal has been charged with rape, he sends Lt. Colonel Sarah Mac MacKenzie to handle the case in a hot zone of Anti-American activity.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Mixed Messages
programme.desc: An intruder shoots three Navy people, killing two. One of the dead is a friend of Harm, who protects his reputation. Webb, counter-espionage, and disinformation are involved; Bud solves it. Mac and Renee return to town; Mac leaves again.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Ambush
programme.desc: Capt. Shepard leads his troop off its peacekeeping mission and into battle with the colonel of the rebel forces. Consequently, six marines die in the public incident. Harm is sent in to investigate despite a recent touch of bad luck in a string of trials.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Jag-a-thon
programme.desc: The JAG gang takes part in a JAGathon, a charity-benefit marathon, which provides opportunities for personal pride and individual competitiveness. Sturgis feels uncertain, and Harm defends a sailor for impersonating an officer.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Lighthouse of the Rising Sun
programme.desc: A solar storm knocks out power in Los Angeles, and Team Scorpion must help a teen pilot and his girlfriend who are lost over the Pacific without navigation or radio contact.

programme.title: Scorpion: Nerd, Wind and Fire
programme.desc: On Valentine's Day, Team Scorpion must set aside their romantic plans to help a doctor and pilot trapped inside a helicopter that crashed atop a skyscraper.

programme.title: Scorpion: Nerd, Wind and Fire
programme.desc: On Valentine's Day, Team Scorpion must set aside their romantic plans to help a doctor and pilot trapped inside a helicopter that crashed atop a skyscraper.

programme.title: Scorpion: Dumbster Fire
programme.desc: The geniuses of Team Scorpion turn into knuckleheads and Paige must simplify the science for them, when their mental faculties are impaired during a job to prevent the creation of a black hole.

programme.title: Scorpion: Dork Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Team Scorpion inadvertently crashes a bank robbery in progress and is taken hostage. Also, Sylvester's feelings for Florence grow.

programme.title: Scorpion: Gator Done
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to the bayou to track down a cagey alligator in order to stop a deadly mosquito-borne virus, and Paige teaches Walter the concept of the 'white lie.'.

programme.title: Scorpion: Foul Balls
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must use their high IQs to win a softball game when the homeland director challenges, with all of their future government contracts on the line.

programme.title: Scorpion: Kenny and the Jet
programme.desc: Paige's maternal side goes into high gear when Team Scorpion must save an unconscious, a hypothermic boy stuck in the wheel well of their airborne airplane.

programme.title: Scorpion: A Lie in the Sand
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Northeast Africa where they must carefully navigate a minefield in order to save the lives of local villagers.

programme.title: Scorpion: Single Point of Failure
programme.desc: The Governor calls on Team Scorpion when his daughter is mysteriously "bio-hacked" with a deadly virus and has only 24 hours to live.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: A Cyclone
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is determined to prove their worth when a bomber threatens to take out the internet infrastructure of the entire Southwest.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Shorthanded
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Las Vegas for a simple casino job, but a robbery leads to Walter's arrest and the rest of the team is left to clear his name.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Plutonium Is Forever
programme.desc: To fix a Los Angeles nuclear reactor that's on the verge of a cataclysmic meltdown, Walter and the team must reluctantly enlist the help of a troubled former member.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: True Colors
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must pass a mandated psych evaluation or face being disbanded after they're accused of destroying a priceless work of art in an attempt to protect an art exhibit.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Father's Day
programme.desc: A case gets personal for Team Scorpion when three convicts break out of prison and one of them is a brilliant hacker who was forced to help the others steal billions online.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Messy Houses
programme.desc: While answering a domestic disturbance call, Andyʼs personal life is turned inside out when the social worker on the scene turns out to be her estranged mother.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Coming Home
programme.desc: A noise complaint leads Andy and Swarek to an illegal warehouse party, and to an injured John Doe -- a homeless squatter whoʼs been stabbed in the warehouse.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: When a gifted psychic - or, at the very least, a gifted conman - enters 15 Division to help find the missing witness in an organized-crime case, the officers are forced to come face-to-face with some of the hidden truths.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: When a gifted psychic - or, at the very least, a gifted conman - enters 15 Division to help find the missing witness in an organized-crime case, the officers are forced to come face-to-face with some of the hidden truths.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: While investigating the disappearance of a grad-student-turned escort, the officers discover a pattern of missing women. Since Gail fits the physical description of the victims, she is sent on an undercover sting at a high-end hotel.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Out Of Time
programme.desc: After the officers of 15 Division are forced to release a suspected predator, the grim discovery of the body of a missing girl reopens an unsolved case – bringing back Detective Luke Callaghan in from the Homicide Squad to oversee it.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Cold Comforts
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division are still reeling in the aftermath of the unexpected death of one of their colleagues. When they discover that a laptop has been stolen containing sensitive information, they set out to tie up several of open cases.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The Rules
programme.desc: Itʼs “back to basics” for 15 Division when Staff Sergeant Frank Best decides itʼs time for his officers to get back on track.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Every Man
programme.desc: A seasonʼs worth of trials and tribulations come to a head during a frenzied night at the station when the distracted rookies improperly search a prisoner.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: I Never
programme.desc: When a violent child abductor escapes from an emergency hospital visit, 15 Division goes on the hunt for the criminal -- only to discover that heʼs taken another young victim.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Homecoming
programme.desc: On her first day back at 15 Division, Andy must work with Swarek to track down an ex convict determined to get his old life back at any cost. Andy realizes just how much has changed since she walked away from her old life six months ago.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P1
programme.desc: There are many ghost said to haunt Gloucester Prison, from the passive to the most aggressive and as Stuart enters the segregation block he soon fears for his life.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P2
programme.desc: The education block of HMP Gloucester is an eerie set of corridors and empty rooms. Stuart enters for the first time and gradually realises that something is there with him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P2

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P1

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gressenhall Workhouse Pt1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the very haunted school room in the large imposing Gressenhall Workhouse. The activity starts even before Karl gets into the building and becomes one of the most impressive investigations to date.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gressenhall Workhouse Pt2
programme.desc: Stuart investigates two buildings, a forge and the cottage. He could not have imagined the activity that unfolded around him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Guys Cliffe House Pt1
programme.desc: The formidable visage of Guys Cliff House, a once great home, is awe inspiring, as are the stories pf paranormal activity within. Now home to the Masonic fraternity it is home to two temples and many lodges and chapters.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Guys Cliffe House Pt2
programme.desc: The lower Temple in this once great, but now ruined castle, is steeped in history and tales pf ghostly happenings. Stuart investigates a room that is said to house multiple spirits and feels something is watching him in the dark.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Hack Green Bunker
programme.desc: Gregg enters the bunker for the first time and feels its energy. Has he caught the voice of the mysterious woman that some believe was murdered there?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Hack Green Nuclear Bunker
programme.desc: Karl and Stuart head to Hack Green Bunker and witness, first hand, the paranormal activity that regularly occurs there.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Hack Green Nuclear Bunker
programme.desc: Yvette and Glen: Built on ancient ground, Hack Green Nuclear Bunker is a hot spot for paranormal activity. Yvette and Glen go it alone and soon experience the bunkers reputation first-hand.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Hickleton Hall
programme.desc: Once a grand mansion, this huge property is now very much passed it previous grandeur. Stuart investigates the long empty corridors alone and something seems to be following him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Margam Castle P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the ground floor back rooms of this landmark castle alone, but soon realises that something is lurking in the shadows.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Margam Castle P2
programme.desc: The upper floors of Margam Castle are said to be haunted by many different spirits, Stuart goes it alone to try and find them.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Nunnington Hall Pt1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the upper floors of this large manor house that is said to be swarming with paranormal activity of every kind, and gets more than he bargained for.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Nunnington Hall Pt2
programme.desc: The creaky corridors and old rooms of Nunnington Hall have many stories of ghosts and phantoms, Stuart investigates the middle floors and starts to experience unexplained happenings.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House
programme.desc: Karl & Stuart investigate the top floor of this grand Welsh house. The stories of paranormal activity soon come to life as the duo are surrounded by strange occurrences.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the outbuildings of this large estate, where many people have witnessed strange occurrences, some he is about to witness first-hand.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House P2
programme.desc: Stuart investigates the main house alone, although it isn’t long before he feels something is there with him.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining four chefs sample one of Ramsay's complex entrees and then must re-create it correctly and two of the chefs face elimination.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The cooking competition reaches its climax, Gordon presides as the two remaining contestants choose a kitchen team made up of their former rivals. Who will best organise their former teammates and lead themselves to victory this year?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: One contestant's overly speedy delivery arouses Gordon's suspicions. Will they be able to win back his respect during the first dinner service of the series?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Despite having three chefs ejected, it looks like the blue team's fortunes could be improving after another fraught dinner service. Will raw fish and overcooked meat spell the end for more than one hopeful from the red team?(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon challenges the teams to cater a school graduation ceremony before they face another star-studded dinner service. With certain hopefuls bent on sabotage, which team will emerge victorious?(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After a protein test challenge, the teams gear up for another stressful dinner service, this time attended by Gordon's mother Helen. One team finishes way in the lead, but which of the hopefuls will be taking the fall this week?(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must herd farm animals into their proper pens and decide which proteins and starches they will use next.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: This time, the teams compete to create the best Italian opera-inspired dishes, with the winning team getting a shopping trip and a VIP dinner. Later, the teams provide dinner service for members of the Italian Consulate.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Fiery chef Gordon Ramsay puts two teams of aspiring chefs through a series of tough challenges. The teams meet new members before heading into a team challenge in which they must prepare a tasting menu for a dog show.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Boss Terry Davis has been with Home Hardware Stores for 42 years. He worked his way up to the top – now he’s returning to the shop floors and factories to turn flaws into fixes.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia try to repossess a car from a yuppie with a flair for the arts and for mayhem, Sonia, Matt, and Froy reclaim some unusual equipment from an overgrown hippie with some long hair and a short temper, and Matt and Sonia interrupt a house party.

programme.title: Operation Repo: All the Wrong Moves
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia try to repossess a car from a yuppie with a flair for the arts and for mayhem, Sonia, Matt, and Froy reclaim some unusual equipment from an overgrown hippie with some long hair and a short temper, and Matt and Sonia interrupt a house party..

programme.title: Operation Repo: Airplane Arrest
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia are overwhelmed by a swarm of cheerleaders; Matt and Froy interrupt a father and son bonding session gone wrong; the team heads to the raceway to prove they still have what it takes.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Sting Operation Blues
programme.desc: Sonia and Lou find themselves in the middle of nowhere in a tooth-and-nail fight with a trio of nerdy stargazers, Froy and Sonia find a cooperative old man to be a hassle after agreeing to let him get his stuff out of his cluttered car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: Matt and Froy repo a car from a girl whose roommate has been keeping two very big secrets. Sonia and Froy's repo from a creepy husband reveals some incriminating evidence to his wife.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Showstopper
programme.desc: Matt and Froy repo a car from a girl whose roommate has been keeping two very big secrets. Sonia and Froy's repo from a creepy husband reveals some incriminating evidence to his wife, and when Lou and Sonia can't locate their target car, Lou comes up...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Nursery Crime
programme.desc: While attempting a repo of a "green energy" bio-diesel vehicle, Froy's (Froylan Tercero) lack of knowledge of the vehicle's specialized fuel system sets the bus ablaze... and when his error causes it to explode, he and Matt (Matt Burch) abandon builders.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Call for Help
programme.desc: Sonia and Matt go to a garden center to repo a forklift, but a language barrier causes chaos. Matt and Froy are in danger when Froy refuses to call the cops on a gun-wielding debtor.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Big Letdown
programme.desc: Froy meets with a lawyer, but his legal troubles are worse than expected. Sonia and Froy confront a debtor who uses a homeless man in his ploy to keep his car. Then, Sonia and Froy discover one debtor's alcoholism is only a farce to cover a bigger secret.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Waiting Game
programme.desc: Froy meets with a lawyer, but his legal troubles are worse than expected. Sonia and Froy confront a debtor who uses a homeless man in his ploy to keep his car. Then, Sonia and Froy discover one debtor's alcoholism is only a farce to cover a bigger secret.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 100th
programme.desc: Brenda goes into labor on Jen and Adam's wedding day, but Jeff has reservations about being in the delivery room. Adam persuades Jen to make some alternative arrangements for their marriage ceremony.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rules of Engagement: Pilot
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer are a 20-something couple who have gotten engaged and moving in together after just seven months of dating. Meanwhile, their neighbors Jeff and Audrey who have been married for twelve years try to set a good example.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Birthday Deal
programme.desc: Though he's unhappy that Audrey spent more than usual for his birthday party, Jeff wants to stay on her good side to ensure he gets his yearly birthday deal. Though Jeff won't reveal the 'deal.'.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Young and the Restless
programme.desc: After Adam has too many restless nights sleeping in Jennifer’s small bed, he brings home the bed he shared with his ex-girlfriend which causes a fight and leads them tossing out all memories of past relationships.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Kids
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer’s plans for a romantic weekend fall apart after they argue about their different feelings toward careers, finances, and kids. Meanwhile, Audrey is having second thoughts about why she and Jeff have waited so long to have children.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Young and the Restless
programme.desc: After Adam has too many restless nights sleeping in Jennifer’s small bed, he brings home the bed he shared with his ex-girlfriend which causes a fight and leads them tossing out all memories of past relationships.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Hard Day's Night
programme.desc: Jennifer tries to help Jeff’s sore neck with a massage until the situation between them becomes uncomfortable and upsets Audrey. Meanwhile, Russell brings Adam along to help him fight off a school yard bully so Russell can get close to the teacher.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Game on
programme.desc: After Adam buys an expensive video-game console, Jennifer makes him promise to discuss major purchases first, but Russell interferes and makes Adam question the agreement.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff's Wooby
programme.desc: Audrey surprises Jeff by making quilt out of his old t-shirts but regrets her gift when he doesn't stop telling the stories that are behind the shirts.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Mr. Fix-It
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey tackle marital communication issues while Adam and Jennifer discover whether creating a home-made 'videotape' will spice up their love life.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Flirting With Disaster
programme.desc: Adam enjoys stealing the attention of Russell's female admirers, prompting fiance Jennifer to lay down the law and Russell to seek revenge. Meanwhile, Jeff learns an important lesson about sleep deprivation.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Sister
programme.desc: A surprise visit from Audrey's sister Barbara opens a window of opportunity for Russell to prove that beauty is more than what meets the eye - or at least a function of personality and good strategy.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Guy Code
programme.desc: In an effort to beef up their social agenda, Audrey persuades Jeff to double-date, which inadvertently puts the rules governed by the 'guy code' versus the 'marriage code' to the test.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Engagement Party
programme.desc: In an effort to capitalize on his commitment to Jennifer, Adam convinces Jeff to host an engagement party, which ultimately provides a lesson in 'giving' and 'receiving.' Audrey gains an unsolicited insight into her sister Barbara's single life.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bag Ladies
programme.desc: Russell realizes the cost of dating a 'bag lady,' while Adam experiences the social peril of yielding to Jennifer's wishes and sporting a 'man bag.'.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Old School Jeff
programme.desc: Jeff is given an opportunity to 'live it up' during a night out on the town, landing Russell in hot water and Adam to reflect on the details surrounding his impending nuptials.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fix-Ups and Downs
programme.desc: Jennifer and Audrey practice their match-making skills and inadvertently end up date-less while Adam and Jeff score financial gain in the process. Meanwhile, Russell tries a new tactic at 'fixing himself up.'.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Visit from Fay
programme.desc: A visit from Adam's free-spirited mother puts Jennifer's patience to the test and teaches Russell an embarrassing lesson about 'art'. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey find themselves enjoying alternative forms of entertainment.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Time Share
programme.desc: Jeff makes plans to take Audrey away for the weekend to a fancy hotel, even though they’ll have to sit through a time share presentation to get a great deal.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jen at Work
programme.desc: Adam suggests that Jen do some freelance graphic design work for the company but Russell isn't crazy about the idea.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Buyer's Remorse
programme.desc: Jennifer and Adam attempt to practice fiscal responsibility as they consider buying their apartment. Audrey and Jeff offer to write their letter of recommendation, but end up making matters worse when they have a run-in with the landlady.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Pimp My Bride
programme.desc: Russell reluctantly agrees to host a photo shoot in his apartment for Audrey's magazine, with the hope of landing a date with a hot model. Adam steps in to play the groom in Audrey's wedding-themed shoot.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff’s New Friend
programme.desc: Jeff is surprised when Audrey informs him that the new friend he made at the gym is gay. Meanwhile, Russell worries the young woman he's dating might be his daughter.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Voluntary Commitment
programme.desc: After a long line of female assistants, Russell learns that having a male assistant can be very advantageous. Meanwhile, after volunteering to read to the elderly, Audrey makes a bet with Jeff that she can commit to finishing a project.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dad's Visit
programme.desc: Much to Audrey's dismay, Jeff's chauvinist father, who expects Audrey to wait on him hand and foot, extends his visit after spraining his ankle. Meanwhile, Russell has a one-night stand with a woman who won't leave his apartment.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Secret
programme.desc: Audrey discovers that Russell is a closeted fan of Broadway musicals, a fact she promises to keep secret in exchange for free theater tickets. Meanwhile, Adam and Jennifer take dancing lessons in preparation for their wedding.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Twice
programme.desc: When Audrey becomes jealous of a pregnant co-worker, she inadvertently convinces her colleagues that she has a bundle of joy on the way too.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Lyin' King
programme.desc: Things quickly get complicated when Audrey and Jeff decide to ditch a dinner date with Jennifer and Adam in order to attend Brad and Jackie's exclusive, celebrity packed party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Family Style
programme.desc: When Audrey plans a dinner date with Jeff, Jackie (Guest Star Sam Harris) and Brad (Guest Star Orlando Jones), Jeff feels extremely violated when Jackie begins eating off his plate!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Sex Toy Story
programme.desc: When Jennifer and Audrey throw a 'girls only' sex party, Jeff quickly gets insecure when he finds a 'product' Audrey may have purchased.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: House Money
programme.desc: When Jennifer and Russell decide to teach Adam a lesson in responsibility, the joke is on them when Adam has the last laugh.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bosco the Clown
programme.desc: Dog and the team get a big surprise after they track down Bosco, a fugitive who they believe is addicted to methamphetamines. They discover he's off drugs, settling into a normal life with a new girlfriend, and is very friendly.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Destiny Love
programme.desc: Dog is in for a big surprise after he catches a fugitive named Jonaven in a sting operation.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If You Knew Nunu
programme.desc: Dog and the team really have their hands full when they go after a tough guy named Nunu, who leads them on a chase through apartment complexes and a shopping mall before he's finally captured.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Dog's feeling lucky, so he's going to try to capture two women in one day. The first, Moani, has "crazy" tattooed on her neck and is facing drug charges. The second fugitive, Jade, who turns out to be a tough catch, despite help from Jade's sister.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Island, Small Town
programme.desc: Dog has problems when he goes to a small town on the Big Island of Hawaii to track down a fugitive. In a small town, everyone knows everyone else's business, making it impossible for Dog to hunt in secret.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jonah is Missing
programme.desc: Dog and the team search for Jonah, a violent and desperate criminal facing?20 years in jail. The trail goes stale when Dog runs into evasive family members and an angry girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Suga On My Cuffs
programme.desc: Dog and the team go after Kandice, AKA Candy, AKA Suga, a stripper who didn't make her court appearance. They convince one of her friends to lure her to a supermarket parking lot, where Dog has an easy time fetching the fetching young thing. But then.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mothers and Daughters
programme.desc: Dog and Beth take on the heartbreaking case of Rachel. Rachel's mom bailed her out of jail on condition that she go to AA meetings and stick to a curfew. But Rachel hasn't kept up her end of the bargain, and now her mother wants her back to jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Dog Is Smokin'
programme.desc: Dog is trying to cut down on smoking, but it's not easy with his high-stress job. Today, he must track down Walter, a fugitive who believes that the Canadian military has planted a chip in his tooth that allows him to communicate with his van.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Snooze, You Lose
programme.desc: Beth designs a luxurious new office for the team and shows it off to Dog, but the bounty hunter is more interested in starting his hunt for Federico, who's been revoked for missing court dates and generally running amuck.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Dog goes on his a case, which involves Bobby, who's been on parole for three months pending sentencing on an assault charge. Bobby's girlfriend wants him back in jail, and Dog agrees that the Bobby needs to be behind bars.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Helping Hand
programme.desc: Dog answers two very different calls for help from women. In the first case, he helps Leland protect Maria, who's being threatened by her violent husband. Then Dog visit a young woman who's dying and has asked to see Dog as one of her final wishes.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.sub-title: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa, who's just turned 18 and is studying to become a bondsman, gets to do some on-the-job training when she helps Dog hunt for Wayne, who's run out on a bond for second-degree assault.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: In Sickness and In Health
programme.desc: Dog is sick as a dog, but he still must lead the hunt for a fugitive named James. James' girlfriend tries to cover for him, but Dog surprises James in his bedroom and leads him away in cuffs.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If the Shirt Fits...
programme.desc: Beth buys Dog a shirt with an embroidered chicken, but Dog explains he only wears shirts with pictures of either Jesus or a Harley-Davidson. When it's time to go to work, the team goes after Necia, a fugitive with felony charges pending.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Thief Who Stole Christmas
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rock-a-Bye Bounty
programme.desc: Dog and Beth must go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family. Luckily, Beth's nephew, Jason, is visiting and is quickly put to work as the bait.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Father-Hood
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cops and Criminals
programme.desc: After giving a rousing speech to an audience of enthusiastic grade-schoolers, Dog catches up with an old friend, Sheriff Tommy Cayetano, to talk business. Dog's got a tough fugitive, named Mia, to catch and Tommy is happy to lend a hand.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cupid in Cuffs
programme.desc: It's the day before Valentine's Day and love is in the air at Da Kine Bail Bonds--but not for Tapi who has failed to appear in court on theft charges. Dog's plan is to have Leland knock on Tapi's door with a Valentine's gift to draw her out.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bonds of Love
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are finally getting married! They've been together for more than ten years but Dog is determined, as he puts it, to "marry his common law wife the Christian way.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: De-Bug Life
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Brand of Brothers
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image, so he and the guys create their own new logo and business cards. Meanwhile, Willie and Phil help Bella with her science project.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Return of the Beavers
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
